page.title: 13COMMUTING FROM CARDINGTON
page.content: I drive most weekdays to my office in Telford 19 miles away. Why do I do it? My company established an engineering division in Telford 7 years ago.I joined the company a year later and my wife and I,moving from Kent,had to make the choice where to live.I had previously spent over an hour each way travelling to London so I decided to look for a home within a radius of 25/30 minutes.Having lived for the previous 9 years in the rolling Weald of Kent,we quickly came to the conclusion that the flat plain north of Telford was uninteresting;we did not want to live in a town,so our search narrowed to the area of the Wenlock Edge.Cardinton caught my eye one dark night in March.Later acquain- tance of the church,pub,and village school-then still open-confirmed our view it would be a good place to live.
